question: 羅針盤
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Spread out</kanji> a <kanji>needle</kanji> in a <kanji>tray</kanji> of water after rubbing it with a magnet and you'll have made a <vocabulary>compass</vocabulary>! Try it at home kids! It really works!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
